scripts.prebuild: test "$CI" = true && rm -rf content && git clone https://github.com/sveltejs/kit content && npx pnpm install --store=node_modules/.pnpm-store && npm run docs || echo skipping pnpm install
scripts.postbuild: test "$CI" = true && rm -rf .netlify/functions/render/content && mkdir -p .netlify/functions/render/content && cp -r content/documentation .netlify/functions/render/content
